item.title: [GRA7][WebPaaS] - Routine accounts maintenance
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 26, 19:00 - 21:00 UTC

Aug 21, 08:59 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 26/08/2024 19:00 UTC
End time : 26/08/2024 21:00 UTC
Service impact : All projects and environments will continue to function during the upgrade. Integrations and webhooks may fail during the maintenance, and you may notice increased deployment times
Service improvement : Our partner communicated to OVHCloud that they will be doing a routine maintenance on account service.

item.title: [GRA3][Web Hosting] - Cluster 024
item.description:
Aug 23, 20:14 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 23/08/2024 19:55 UTC
End time : 23/08/2024 20:12UTC
Root cause : Network malfunction
(Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.)

We would like to inform you that the incident has now been resolved and the situation is back to normal.

Aug 23, 20:06 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 23/08/2024 19:55 UTC
Service impact : Websites are unreachable on Cluster 024
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are investigating the issue.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

item.title: [GRA3][WebHosting] - Cluster024
item.description:
Aug 23, 16:36 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 23/08/2024 13:35 UTC
End time : 23/08/2024 15:45 UTC
Service status : The situation is back to normal, the service is running nominally.
Root cause : It was due to a malfunction on some harwares.

Aug 23, 16:17 UTC
Update - Most of servers are operational again.

Aug 23, 16:17 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Aug 23, 14:02 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 23/08/2024 13:35 UTC
Service impact : Some web cloud hostings on cluster024 are temporary unavailable.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

item.title: [GLOBAL][Internet Access] - Eligibility and order taking
item.description:
Aug 23, 14:38 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 23/08/2024 14:00 UTC
End time : 23/08/2024 14:30 UTC
Service impact : Customers faced difficulties with eligibility and order taking on the site https://www.ovhtelecom.fr/offre-internet/ and APIv6.
Root cause : Some provider's eligibility services were degraded.
The situation is back to normal, the service is running nominally.

item.title: [GRA][WebHosting] - Cluster006/021
item.description:
Aug 23, 12:25 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 22/08/2024 14:15 UTC
End time : 22/08/2024 20:44 UTC
Root cause : This incident was due to overload on a network equipment.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

We would like to inform you that the incident has now been resolved and the situation is back to normal.

Aug 22, 20:44 UTC
Update - We are continuing to monitor for any further issues.

Aug 22, 20:44 UTC
Monitoring - Start time : 22/08/2024 14:15 UTC
Ongoing actions : Our team has implemented a fix, there is no further impact for now, we are monitoring the issue.

Aug 22, 19:53 UTC
Identified - The service is again under some load on cluster021, the only impact for now is some occasional slowness and we're investigating.

Aug 22, 19:53 UTC
Update - We are continuing to monitor for any further issues.

Aug 22, 15:32 UTC
Update - Service is restored, some slowdown could still happen, we closely check it

Aug 22, 15:31 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Aug 22, 15:30 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Aug 22, 14:49 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 22/08/2024 14:15 UTC
Service impact : Some slowdown is observed on some hosted websites.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

item.title: [GRA1][WebHosting] - Cluster001 - Filerz1825
item.description:
Aug 23, 00:35 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Aug 22, 23:30 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Aug 16, 21:28 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our web hosting offer

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 22/08/2024 23:30 UTC
End time : 23/08/2024 00:30 UTC
Service impact : The filerz will have a downtime of 60 minutes during the migration.
Service improvement : We are going to update the filerz below (Mail-hosting server) to a newer and more stable version.
The goal of this maintenance is to improve the performance and enhance the security of our infrastructure.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [RBX/GRA][MXPlan] - Switch Loadbalancer migration

Start time : 22/08/2024 22:00 UTC
End time : 22/08/2024 23:00 UTC
Service impact : During this maintenance operation, emails will not be accessible for around 10 minutes.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will switch customer network mail flow from NSX-V to NSX-T on mxplan3.mail.ovh.net infra

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [GLOBAL][VOIP] - Provisioning
item.description:
Aug 23, 14:51 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Aug 22, 20:06 UTC
Update - The incident is still ongoing. We would like to assure you that we are doing our utmost to resolve this situation as quickly as possible.

As soon as the situation evolves or the incident is resolved, we will keep you informed.

Thank you for your understanding

Aug 22, 16:25 UTC
Update - Some customers have regained their operational capacity.

Aug 22, 13:51 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Aug 22, 13:33 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 16/08/2024 12:00 UTC
Service impact : Customers having RMA on MGCP lines have their lines incorrectly provisioned. 48 hours after receiving new phones, the MGCP line is deactivated, and the SIP line remains inactive.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

item.title: [GRA][Web Hosting] - Cluster030 incident notification
item.description:
Aug 20, 03:03 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 19/08/2024 23:50 UTC
End time : 20/08/2024 03:00 UTC
Root cause : Load on filerz due to backups/snapshots
We would like to inform you that the incident has now been resolved and the situation is back to normal.

Aug 20, 02:28 UTC
Update - Filerz1022 is temporarily unavailable.
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

Aug 20, 02:09 UTC
Identified - Start time : 19/08/2024 23:50 UTC
Service impact : Slowness on websites hosted on Cluster030 were being observed from 20/08/2024 00:12 UTC till 20/08/2024 00:42 UTC.
Slowness have been again observed since 20/08/2024 01:23 UTC.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.
